Title: Splay and Docker: deployment and testbed scaling made easy
Description:
This "asciicast" shows how easy it is to deploy, use and scale a Splay (www.splay-project.org) testbed with docker.
First, a minimal testbed is deployed, composed by three containers: the controller, one splay deamon, and the splay command-line-interface component.
Then, when the user needs more nodes, the asciicast shows how to use docker-compose to scale the total number of deamon containers.
